version_description: - Now supports iPhone 5 widescreen!

Celebrate with us the release of COVER ORANGE 2! This final update brings you 20 new levels, for total of 400 levels!

Thank you for all your dedication to save the Oranges!
- 40 new levels have been added!
- 40 new levels have been added!
- 40 new levels have been added!

- 20 new levels, next update already in the works
- Retina icon fixed
- level complete check-mark added
- restart and pause button response improved.
- new achievements added
- FDG Facebook link added, please join us.

**********************************************
Please rate the game with 5 stars after every update to keep the free updates coming. 
Thanks for your support!

**********************************************
